name: Ball Madness v0.5
description:
Use WASD to move and Q to fire, but be careful! You only have 3 bullets. Although these will be given back if you succesfully hit a normal enemy (red bois).

Now beware of the huge Black Destruction Hole™, as it will eat your bullets. If you have 1 bullet (or 2 and fire at it) you will be forcefully enlisted in the Black Destruction Hole™ army. You will know when it approaches as you can see it's huge aura.
